title: I have to write a five stanza poem about what would happen if I accidentally ran my brother over with a wagon. Does anyone have any good examples? - Quora

response.answer_text: As I went to the woods one dayTo steal a treasure from a dragonI found my brother in the wayAnd ran him over with my wagon He let out a pathetic yelpHis bones were broken feet to crownHe begged me to go get some helpBut in the end I put him down I dumped the body in the wagonAnd rolled it to the dragon’s lairAnd tried to feed it to the dragonBut was accosted by a bear Then leaving me with a hungry dragonThe bear dragged brother’s body offI tried to hide beneath my wagonBut nervously began to cough The dragon dragged me from beneathThe wagon and then had the pleasure Of munching me from toes to teethAnd no one got the dragon’s treasure © Bobby Griffith
